      • main

      • SaveMemory

        public static void SaveMemory(double num1)
        This method recieves a double number that is saved in a global array, if the array is full
        the values of the array are moved and the new value remplaces the value of the position 0 of the array
        Pre: The variable num1 that is passed like param needs to be declared before, needs to contain a
        correct type of value.
        Post: The number num1 is added to the global double array memory, if the array is full
        the numbers in the array are moved, the first number added is erased, and is added the num1.
        The global variable contMemory is increased by one
        Parameters:
        num1 - this is a double number num1!=null && num1 == (number)

      • identifyMemory

        public static java.lang.String identifyMemory(java.lang.String num1)
        This method recieve a string, and compare the string with the cases of a switch; return a memory, or the value of PI,
        or the same string, depending the contain of the string
        Pre: The variable num1 that is passed like parameter need to be declared before, need to contain
        a number or an option available to choose. The array Memory need to be declared before.
        Post: Return a number of a array Memory, the value of PI, or if the string isn't a option return
        the number on the string. This number was transform to a string
        Parameters:
        num1 - this is a string that could have a number or a valid option of the switch num1 ==(switch case)||num1==number
        Returns:
        mem, tht is the string with the corresponding value

      • identifyOperator

        public static java.lang.String identifyOperator(java.lang.String operator,
                                                java.lang.String num,
                                                java.util.Scanner in)
        This method recieve a 2 strings and a scanner, the first string is the operator, and the second is a number on a string;
        compares the operator with the cases of a switch, if the operation needs 2 numbers the method use the scanner to get the
        second; calls the method of the corresponding case that returns the result
        of the operation. After this, calls the method saveMemory that save the result on a global array.
        Pre: The variable operator that is passed like parameter needs to be declared before, needs to contain a correct
        type of value. The variable num needs to be declared before, needs to contain a number on a string,
        or a hex, or binary numbers. The Scanner in needs to be daclared before. All the methods need to exist.
        The library Math need to be imported.
        Post: the result value is saved in the array memory, the result is in the variable result, that after is returned
        Parameters:
        num - this is a string that have a number, a hex number, or a binary num. num ==(hex)||num==(binary)||num==number && num!=null
        operator - this is a string that contains one of the options of the switch. operator!=null
        in - this is a scanner object, this need to be declared before
        Returns:
        result, is the final value of the operation made.

        public static double Sum(double num1,
                         double num2)

        Pre: the num1 and num2 variables need to be declared before.
        Post: the result is saved in the variable sum, that after is returned
        Parameters:
        num1 - this is a double number. num1!=null&&num1==(number)
        num2 - this is a double number. num2!=null&&num2==(number)
        Returns:
        sum, is the final value of the operation made.

      • HexToDec

        public static double HexToDec(java.lang.String num1)
        This method recieve a string that contains a hex number, converts the string in a array
        make the conversion to the decimal number, transform the array in a number and returns it
        Pre: the num1 variables need to be declared before.
        Post: the result is saved in the variable dec, that after is returned
        Parameters:
        num1 - this is a string that contains a hexadecimal number. num1!=null&&num1==(hex number)&&num1!=double number
        Returns:
        dec, is the equivalent value of the hexadecimal number in decimal number.

      • HexToBin

        public static java.lang.String HexToBin(java.lang.String num1)
        This method recieve a string that contains a hex number, calls the methods HexToDec and DecToBin and return the
        corresponding value
        Pre: the num1 variables need to be declared before, the methods HexToDec and DecToBin need to be created

        Post: the result is saved in the variable bin, that after is returned
        Parameters:
        num1 - this is a string that contains a hexadecimal number. num1!=null&&num1==(hex number)&&num1!=double number
        Returns:
        bin, is the equivalent value of the hexadecimal number in binary number.
